summary_detail.value: Beaver Creek Road is open from 5th Avenue through to Taylor Road and to Rocky Boy Agency.   Beaver Creek Park is closed to recreation, and the Hill County Sheriff’s Department is asking the public to stay out of the area for firefighter safety- the side roads within the park are still closed to the public.   Sucker Creek Road is closed between Beaver Creek and Clear

title: East Fork Fire Closures (East Fork Fire Wildfire)
